content: Kaimutthinulllla geetham
(karunakkadale.... Enna reethi)
(23-aam sangkeertthanam)

Kartthaavaa-nennude i-dayan
Yaahenna-llo than naamam meyicheedu-
Nnenne pul-mettil
/tsvachchhajala-tthinnarukil nee
/tenne nada-tthi nirmmalamaam jeevajalatthe
/tpaanam cheyyikkum
En praana-nu kullireku-nnu
Enne nada-tthu-nneppozhum van karamathinaal
neethiyathin -paathe
/tkoorirullin-maddhye-yennaal
/tnyaanethum pedikkilla ethoranarththham
/tvannu bhavi-chaa-lum
Neeyennum-ennodukoo-de
Undello-ennortthu param modikkunnu
ennullllil-ennum
/tnin vadiyum-ninnude ko-lum
/tenne nayi-kkum nervazhiyil aayushkkaalam
/tnyaan thettu-kayi-lla
En thalaye-melttharamaa-kum
Thailatthaa-le-poosheedum nirmmalamaakkum
Nyaan thoshi-cheedum
/tninnude nanmayathum ka-runa
/tennennum-e-nneyennum pinthudarumaho
/ten aayushkkaale
Nyaan yaahin-aalayamullllil
ennennum vaasam cheyyum haalelooyyaa
naathhaa nalli-dayaa
Vishuddha sabha

Sabha mashihaa-naathhan thottam
shuddhathayo-da-ddhvaanikkum marthyar dhanyar
Prathiphalamaarji-kkum
/tsabha mashihaa-than manavaatti,
/tthan raktha-tthaal veendavalle kashdappaadaal
/tthan-marana-tthaalum
Sabha mashihaa-thannude deham,
mashihaanaa-thhan thalayaayi vaazhunnennum
Sabhaye mo-di-kka
/tsabha jeevi-cheedunna-vanil
/tthannude de-ham - bhakshichu raktham paanam
/t cheyyunnon-dha-nyan
/tsabhaye mo-dikkuka ni-thyam,
/tnin naathhan-jee-vikkunnu haalelooyyaa,
/tnaathhaa sthothram-the
Kartthaavin-kashdappaa-daal
Thanmarana-tthaal thannuyiraal puthiyoru munti-ri
Tthottam thaa-n na-ttu
/tthottatthil-pani chey/u200bvaa-naay
/tshleehanmaa-re-villichettam niyamichavare
/tbhoothalasee-ma-vare
Avar vazhiyaa-yu melpatta-kkaar
Pattakkaa-r she-mmanmaar yauppadiyakkinar
korooya-nanmaa-rum
/tsuvishesham-ghoshippaa-num
/tmeshayil shushrooshippaa-num adhikaaram nal-
/tkiya mashihaa-sthu-thyan
Kartthaavinte manushyaavathaaram

Daivam sr-shdichaada-tthe
Daivam thante roopatthil saadrshyatthil
Poozhiyathil-ni-nnum
/tekanathaayu - jeevikkaa-the
/tavanil ni-nnum-srshdichu havvaa enna
/taadyamathaam-naa-ri
Edanila-vare paarppichu,
Kalpanakall-nal-ki Daivam avarude vaasam
kandavano-thr-pthan
/tpaampinnu-padesham kettor
/tdaivatthil-ni-nnum thettipoyavar parudee-saa
/tnashda-mathaakki
Paazhoozhi-yiladdhvaani-chu,
Vasippaanaa-yu dai-vam avare paarppichettam
Ee dharaye- nalki
/tthalamurakall - avaril ni-nnum
/tvaluthaayu va-nnu - paapatthin vishachashakatthe,
/tpaanam chey-the-ttam
Daivatthin-kalpanayaa-le
Nibiyanmaar va-nnulghoshichettam vachanam
Daivatthil - ni-nnum
/tparudeesaa-nashdamathaa-kkiya,
/tvaasanaye-thaalolichu paapatthin padu-
/tkuzhiyil pe-tta-ppoll
Daivamaya-chu than su-thane,
Lokatthin paa-pam peraan kanyakayil ni-
Nnavathaaram-cheythu
/tammaanu-velaam dai-vam
/tmaanushanaay-maanavaridayil sahavaasam
/tcheythupade-shi-chu
Than marana-tthaalumuyir-ppaal,
Sabhaye na-tton sthuthyanaho haalelooyyaa
Sthothramava-ne-nnum
Vi. Kurbbaana

Maanavare-vannullpoo-kin,
Pallllikku-llllil-kartthaavin thanurakthangall
Arppicheedunnu
/tkartthaavin-rakthasharee-ram,
/tnammude paa-pam-pokkunnu malinatha neekki
/tvenmayathaa-kkunnu
Sabhayude jee-van kurbbaa-na
Kaikkollvo-re-nnum jeevan praapikkunnu
Nithyathaye-poo-kaan
/tjeevan nal-kum kurbbaana,
/tnammudeye-llaam-hrdayatthe nirmmalamaakki,
/tshuddhivaru-tthu-nnu
Ee kurbbaa-nayashippo-ro,
Bhaagyamavar-thaan-jeevippor kristhuvumaayi
Nithyathayil-noo-nam
Maddhyasthhatha

Daivatthin-maathaave-nin
Praarththhanayaa-l nya-ngall nedenam krpaadaanam
Nyangall yaa-chi-ppu
/tmaartthommaa-shleehaa thaa-thaa,
/tthal praarththha-nayaal-yaachanayaal krpa nedanam
/tthalpraarththha-na sha-ranam
Maar greego-riyosu thaa-thaa,
Thal praarththha-nayaal-yaachanayaal krpa nedanam
Thalpraarththha-na sha-ranam
/tmrtharaayo-re saubhaagyam
/tuththhaana-tthin - naall ningall nedum thaathan
/tsvargamahaa-raajyam.
Maar yaakkobinte reethi
Melpattakkaar

En kartthaave en kartthaave nin krpayil nyaan
Aanandikkum thavamahimayil nyaanaamodikkum
Nin thirukkarangall jeevithasaraniyil thaangaakaname.
nin thirumozhikall en kaathukalle kullirppikkaname.

Navare prathimahithamavasthhaye vittuyaratthe
Thaazhe bhoomiyilavathaaram cheython suthaneeshaa
Nin narasnehamathullkkondengall vanneedunnu
Valathukaram vechengalle vaazhtthuka karunaasindho

Kaazhchayil naranaanengkilumavano daivasuthan thaan
Vachanam jadamaayi vannoru logosu thanayan noonam
Paripoornnan thaathan than soonu poornnan Daivam
Maanavanaayathumathbhuthamathiloru samshayamilla.

Aadaam havvaayavarude paapappisharukall theerkkaan
Randaam havvaa mariyam thannude udare janichaan
Akhilaandatthe menanyon Daivam naranaayu vannu
Lokam avaneyarinyillennathu sathyam thanne

Aadimapaapam theerkkaan naranaayu vannoru devaa
Aakkuka nyangalle nin raajyatthinnavakaashikallaayu
Nin thanurakthangalle shuddhamathaayu bhakshichathinaal
Ninnodu koode vaazhaanengalle yogyarathaakka

Ninnude kashdappaadaal kurishil mrthiyaalulakil
Nee veendoru sabha sthuthi nathi cheyyunneesho mashihaa
Nin sabha jeevanathaakaan nalki nin thanuraktham
Appam veenyiva drshdaantamathaayu shleeharkkeki

Pallllikkullllil appam veenyiva baliyarppichu
Pattakkaaran paapa vimochanamarththhikkunnu.
Evarumorupol paapavimukthiye nedeedunnu
Kartthan thanurakthangallashichathha modikkunnu

Sabhaye sabhaye modicheeduka kartthanilennum
Nin manavaallan maranam saatthaanivare vennu
Ninnude makkallkkennum mashihaa thunayaakatte
Santoshatthodavar ihaloke jeevikkatte

Nallathu kaanmaanengade kankalle thelliyikkaname
Nallathu kellppaan nyangade chevikall thuranneedaname
Nallathu bhaashippaanaayu nyangadeyadharangalleyum
Nallathu chintippaayu nalloru hrdayavumeka

Nee nalkiyathaam thaalantukalle varddhippikkaan
Varamarullaname nee chodikkum naall nalkeedaan
Nannaayaddhvaanichaahaaram kaikkondeedaan
Balamekaname nyangade gaathram shubhamaayennum

Aayussaarogyam nalkeeduka mashihaa naathhaa
Ninneyennum sthuthichey/u200bvaanaayu balamekaname
Nallaahaaram paarppidamenniva nalkeedenam
Sasyalathaadikall nannaayu villavukall nalkeette.

Rogam duà´ƒkham peedhakall manassil vedanayellaam
Maayikkaname ninne vaazhtthaan nal manamode
Varshikkaname aashishamaariyee dharaye nanappaan
Venal manyum mazhayum kramamaay
Vanneedaname.

Thaathasuthaathmaavaam parishuddha mahonnatha devaa
Thrithvaasthhithane yaahe devaa svargasthhithane
Akhilaandatthe menanyoru syashdaavaam sarvveshaa
Kooppunnulakam thirusannidhiyil krpa cheyname.
Maar apreminte reethi

Paripaavanamaamee sudine
Paripaavanamaayu thiru savidhe
Parichodu vanneeyadiyaaril
Parane nalvaramarullaname

Sehiyon maallikayil naathhan
Shishyarkkekiya than rudhiram
Than thirusabhayude aahaaram
Thannavanaam naathhan sathyan

Shishyarodotheeya thiruvachanam
Nalkunnen thanurakthangall
Shuddhamathaayu bhakshipporil
Nyaanennum vaasam cheyyum

Thaanothiya sthhaapanavachanam
Othunnu thirusabhayennennu
Thannude randaam varavuvare
Smaranam cheyyum nishchayamaay

Paapatthin mutthukallellaam
Kazhukikkallayum kurbbaana
Nithyamathaam jeevan nedaan
Maargamathaayu naathhan nalkee

Kartthan rakthashareeram
Shuddhamathaayu paanam cheyvor
Vaasam cheyyum ennennum
Nithyamathaam jeevan thannil

Thanurakthangall vazhiyaayu naam
Naathhanodoppam vaaneedum
Impamathaam parudeesaayil
Vaazhum svargeeyarkkoppam

Eeshaa naathhaa nin sleebaa+
Nyangallkkennum van kotta
Dushdanil ninnum kaattheedum
Sleebaayil+pukazhunnennum

Nin maathaavin praarththhanayaal
Parishuddhanmaar praarththhanayaal
Nalkuka nin sabhayil shaanti
Sarvvashvaryavumee deshe

Pithr puthravishuddhaathmaave
Sarvvatthinum udayavane
Vandanavum sthuthiyum pukazhum
Ennennum angekkaammen.
Kukkoyo
(yajamaanan... Reethi)
84-aam sangkeertthanam

Yaahe ninnude aalayamethrayo shobhana geham
Ennullllam yaahin bhavanam mohicheedunnu
/tennude hrdayam - ennude gaathramathum
/tyaahe nokki - ghoshicheedunnu
Kuruvikall than kunyungallkkaayu kandetthi geham
En naathhaa en daivavume ninnaalayamallo
/thaalelooyyaa nyaanathil vaaneedum

Ninnaalayamathil vaazhunnor dhanyanmaar noonam
Ninneyennum sthuthi cheyyum nanmaanasamode
/tbalam ninnilullllor - dhanyanmaarennum
/tavarude hrdaye - seeyon peruvazhikall
Kanneer thaazhvara thaandumpoll khedicheedilla
Krpayil poornnarathaayavaro praapikkunnu balam
/thaalelooyyaa - u haalelooyyaa

Sainyangall than kartthaave en praarththhana kellkka
En parichayathaam kartthaave ennil chevichaaykka
/tnin praakaare vaazhunnoru divasam
/tvere sahasram divasatthil menma
Dushdanmaarude bhavanatthil paarkkunnathinekkaall
En kartthaavin bhavanatthil kaavalkkaaranathaayu
/tvaaneedaan nyaan ettam kaamkshippu

Thaathaathmaja parishuddhaathmaa threeyekan Daivam
Vaazhtthappedumaaraakatte bhoolokamathennum
/tsakalarumorupol naathhane vaazhtthatte
/tsrshdikallakhilam - vandicheedatte
sarvvatthin naathhan Daivam srshdiye vidhi chey/u200bvaan
aagathanaakum neratthu thirumumpil nilppaan
/thaalelooyyaa - yogyatha nalkaname.
